seo: 宏景,sql注入,漏洞检测,安全测试
summary: 该插件用于检测宏景系统的pos_dept_post接口是否存在延迟型SQL注入漏洞，通过发送特定构造的POST请求并检测响应时间来判断漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether there is a time-delay SQL injection vulnerability in the pos_dept_post interface of Hongjing system. It determines the existence of the vulnerability by sending specially crafted POST requests and checking the response time.
